Package net.minestom.server.timer

Class SchedulerManager

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.timer.SchedulerManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExtensionObserver
public final class SchedulerManager extends Object implements IExtensionObserver
An object which manages all the Task's.

Task first need to be built with buildTask(Runnable), you can then specify a delay with as example TaskBuilder.delay(long, java.time.temporal.TemporalUnit) or TaskBuilder.repeat(long, java.time.temporal.TemporalUnit), and to finally schedule: TaskBuilder.schedule().

Shutdown tasks are built with buildShutdownTask(Runnable) and are executed, as the name implies, when the server stops.

    • removeExtensionTasksOnUnload

      public void removeExtensionTasksOnUnload(String extension)
      Unschedules all non-transient tasks (Task.isTransient()) from this scheduler. Tasks are allowed to complete
      Parameters:
      extension - the name of the extension to unschedule tasks from
      See Also:
